summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 3.0°C) and outside temperature (up 2.2°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 2.1 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 4024 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1794 m), light levels (up 9615 lux), and inside temperature (up 2.3°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; temperatures should feel nicely warm. Also, the air will be thick and uncomfortable and calm and still conditions are expected. Light to moderate rain is forecast, occasional overcast conditions, and moderate levels of sunlight will be present. The weather may change rapidly and become worse.
